name: Heatwave (gameslee)
description:
In the world of Heatwave, a decade long drought has caused desertification on a global scale. Your small band of survivors has survived so far by rationing what was left, but now water is running out, and with the temperatures rising rapidly, you have no choice but to make for the city.

Heatwave pits the player against the board in a race against time. It plays like a board game, with a roll of the die starting each turn. Cards are drawn from the event deck, and the player must weather the events and keep as many party members alive as possible until they reach the goal.  With 10 unique characters and a variety of events, Heatwave is sure to have the player coming back for more!

This game was made for the June/July Jackpot Jam, following the "Heatwave" theme!
